title: Rainy city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: A blue car drives slowly on a rainy city street with tall buildings and a palm tree on the sidewalk.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNoon). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 0.9 m/s). There are 27 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars on the street. The traffic lights are visible in the distance, and there is a pedestrian crossing the street. The weather is rainy, and the visibility is moderate.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because of the rain and the presence of other vehicles on the road. It brakes frequently to avoid collisions and maintain a safe distance from the cars ahead. The tall buildings and the palm tree on the sidewalk add to the urban atmosphere of the scene.
